## Summary

- [ ] Small, focused change (one logical purpose)
- [ ] Behavior change is covered by tests (unit/integration)

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated
  - [ ] Unit tests
  - [ ] Integration/smoke tests (if applicable)
- [ ] CI: linters, type checks, tests are passing
- [ ] Performance impact considered (N/A if not applicable)
- [ ] Docs/README updated (if behavior or usage changed)
- [ ] Rollout/flagging plan for risky changes (if applicable)
